name: SimpleHash
headline: Multi-chain NFT data platform
description:
SimpleHash allows developers to query all blockchain data from a single platform. We index multiple blockchains, take care of edge cases, and can be integrated in a few lines of code. We make the lives of developers working with token data easier by abstracting away all the complexity.

We serve some of the leading names in crypto, including Coinbase, Phantom and Uniswap. We're growing quickly, are well-funded, and have an ambitious vision to organize the world of digital assets.

Join us if you're excited by a high impact role on a lean, fast paced team at the forefront of the revolution in digital assets.

founders.name: Alex Kilkka, Founder
founders.description: Technical co-founder building NFT infrastructure at SimpleHash. Previously CTO at showtime.io, the NFT social network.

generated_description:
### SimpleHash: A Game-Changer in NFT Data

**Company Overview**
SimpleHash is a promising startup in the crypto space, founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22. Based in San Francisco, the company operates at the intersection of digital assets and developer tools. Their mission? To create a multi-chain NFT data platform that simplifies access to blockchain data for developers.

**The Problem They Solve**
Developers often grapple with the complexities of querying blockchain data. SimpleHash addresses this by providing a unified API that abstracts away the challenging aspects of data retrieval across multiple blockchains. This allows developers to integrate high-quality token and NFT data with just a few lines of code, streamlining their processes and enhancing efficiency.

**Key Features**
- **Cross-Chain Compatibility**: Access data from 80+ blockchains, ensuring no developer is locked into a single ecosystem.
- **Instant APIs**: Get real-time token prices, metadata, and media across various platforms—including major players like Coinbase, Phantom, and Uniswap.
- **Robust Infrastructure**: With 99.999% uptime, SimpleHash is designed for reliability and speed.
  
**Trusted by Industry Leaders**
Some of their notable clients include Coinbase, Uniswap, and Phantom—an indicator that they’re gaining traction within the cryptocurrency ecosystem. As they continue to grow quickly with solid backing from investors, SimpleHash is well-positioned to redefine how developers interact with digital assets.

**A Team of Experts**
SimpleHash is helmed by a talented team with deep expertise in crypto and SaaS development, bringing insights from leading companies like Google and McKinsey. They leverage this background to create solutions that precisely meet developer needs.

**Join the Revolution**
SimpleHash is not just another API provider; they are building infrastructure that supports the complete evolution of digital assets. If you're a developer looking for a comprehensive solution in the NFTs and crypto arena, check out their platform [here](https://www.simplehash.com). Whether you want to explore their API, read case studies, or just get inspired by their innovative approach, SimpleHash offers a wealth of opportunities at the forefront of the digital asset revolution.
